question: The next number of the sequence 3, 5, 9, 17, 33 …. is :
explanation:
$latex 3\\xrightarrow{+2}5\\xrightarrow{+4=2^{2}}9\\xrightarrow{+8 = 2^{3}}17\\xrightarrow{+16= 2^{4}}33\\xrightarrow{+32 = 2^{5}}\\underline{65}&s=1$
∴ The next term in the sequence will be 65.
Hence option [C] is the right answer.
